basisSet.dc:title: aug-cc-pVQZ-DK
basisSet.dct:abstract: VQZPD All-electron Douglas-Kroll Valence Quadruple Zeta + Polarization
basisSet.dc:description: All-electron, Douglas-Kroll Transition Metal aug-cc-pVQZ-DK Basis Sets ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Sc - Zn: (23s,19p,12d,4f,3g,2h) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,3g,2h] N.B. Balabanov and K.A. Peterson, J. Chem. Phys. 123, 064107 (2005)
